head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LOMBARDO, GUY V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LOMBARDO, GUY V.

block.p: LOMBARDO--Guy V. On February 25, 2004. Beloved husband of Anne P. (nee Pacurar). Loving father of Victor Lombardo, Lisa Charles, Turi Benjamin and Donna Rohan. Cherished grandfather of eight. Dear brother of David Carmen Lombardo. Memorial Service at the Harden Funeral Home of Bayside, Northern Blvd at 209th Street. Visiting hours Sunday 1-3pm. In lieu of flowers please make donations to the Don Monti Memorial Research Foundation, North Shore University Hospital, 300 community Drive, Manhasset, NY 11030.
